{{cpp/chrono/month_weekday_last/title|ok}}
{{cpp/chrono/month_weekday_last/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|1=
constexpr bool ok() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

检查所含的 {{ltt|cpp/chrono/month}} 和 {{ltt|cpp/chrono/weekday_last}} 对象是否均合法。

=== 返回值 ===
{{c|month().ok() &amp;&amp; weekday_last().ok()}}

===示例===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;chrono&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
 
int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::boolalpha;

    auto mwdl{std::chrono::March/std::chrono::Wednesday[std::chrono::last]};
    std::cout &lt;&lt; (mwdl.ok()) &lt;&lt; ' ';
    mwdl = {std::chrono::month(3)/std::chrono::weekday(42)[std::chrono::last]}; 
    std::cout &lt;&lt; (mwdl.ok()) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
true false
}}
